questions.question_text: What kind of activity does a User Search help you investigate?

choices.B: A list of process activity executed by the specified user account
choices.C: A count of failed user logon activity
choices.A: A history of Falcon UI logon activity
choices.D: A list of DNS queries by the specified user account

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
User Search
 (Investigate: Asset graph, host, event, hash)
 (See full detection: details, process table, process tree, process graph, events timeline)

Selected Answer: A
A. User Search tools allow you to view history of logon activity. 
B is typically found under process and service monitoring tools rather than User Search. 
C. this is part of security and authentication logs rather than the User Search.
D. this are tracked by network monitoring tools.

Selected Answer: B
B
B. A list of process activity executed by the specified user account

questions.question_text: To view Files Written to Removable Media within a specified timeframe on a host within the Host Search page, expand and refer to the _____________ dashboard panel.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D
D. Suspicious File Activity

questions.question_text: When performing a raw event search via the Events search page, what are Event Actions?

choices.C: Event Actions are pivotable workflows including connecting to a host, pre-made event searches and pivots to other investigatory pages such as host search.
choices.A: Event Actions contains an audit information log of actions an analyst took in regards to a specific detection.
choices.D: Event Actions is the field name that contains the event name defined in the Events Data Dictionary such as ProcessRollup, SyntheticProcessRollup, DNS request, etc.
choices.B: Event Actions contains the summary of actions taken by the Falcon sensor such as quarantining a file, prevent a process from executing or taking no actions and creating a detection only.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C
C. Event Actions are pivotable workflows including connecting to a host, pre-made event searches and pivots to other investigatory pages such as host search.

Selected Answer: C
When performing a raw event search via the Events search page, Event Actions are pivotable
workflows that allow you to perform various tasks related to the event or the host.

questions.question_text: What information is shown in Host Search?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D
D. Processes and Services

choices.A: Create a custom alert for each domain

questions.question_text: You are reviewing a list of domains recently banned by your organization's acceptable use policy. In particular, you are looking for the number of hosts that have visited each domain. Which tool should you use in Falcon?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C
C. Bulk Domain Search
